activities.title: Clawdbot Identity & Setup
activities.description: Set up Rara identity (AI familiar), configured SOUL.md, USER.md, IDENTITY.md, AGENTS.md. Connected via Telegram to Rah.
activities.what_worked: BOOTSTRAP.md flow — structured first conversation worked well for establishing identity
activities.improvements: Could automate more of the initial file creation

activities.title: Trading System Migration from Hetzner
activities.description: Migrated all trading system files from old Hetzner server (5.161.231.205) to local MacBook Air. Two folders dropped: allfilestradingsystem202601310015/ (Python tools + backtest engine) and completedocumentationpackageallmarkdownfiles/ (docs). 16 Python tools reorganized into trading/.
activities.what_worked: Clean folder structure made it easy to reorganize
activities.what_didnt: Some old server references (5.161.231.205) still in docs
activities.improvements: Find-and-replace old server IPs across all docs

activities.title: Gmail Integration (IMAP + SMTP)
activities.description: Connected rara3bot@gmail.com via app password. Set up IMAP reading and SMTP sending. Default recipient: llctechboost@gmail.com. 16 existing messages in inbox.
activities.what_worked: App password approach — clean, no OAuth complexity
activities.improvements: Could add OAuth later for more security

activities.title: Google Cloud Service Account Setup
activities.description: Configured GCP project dash-485802 with service account. Sheets API working. OAuth client in rara-485713 project (unused for now).
activities.what_worked: Service account key was already generated
activities.what_didnt: OAuth client created but not needed
activities.improvements: Clean up unused GCP resources later

activities.title: Scanner V3 Bug Fixes — Major Overhaul
activities.description: Fixed 5 critical bugs: (1) HTF false positives — raised threshold from 15% to 40%, eliminated 45 fake breakouts. (2) Score overflow — capped at 12 (was 13/12). (3) Duplicate buy points — deduped. (4) GOOGL appearing in both sections — one section per stock. (5) RS Rating broken on small samples — absolute thresholds for <20 stocks.
blockers: Understanding the existing scanner code flow
activities.what_worked: Systematic approach — fix one bug, test, next. Each fix verified with full scan output comparison.
activities.what_didnt: Initially raised HTF threshold too low (25%), still had some false positives. Had to go to 40%.
activities.improvements: Write unit tests for scanner edge cases. Add regression test for known-good stocks.

activities.title: New Features: Earnings Warning + Signal Penalties
activities.description: Added earnings proximity warning (⚠️ flags within 14 days). Signal matcher now penalizes: -25 pts for ≤7 days to earnings, -15 pts for ≤14 days. Also penalizes bearish options flow on bullish signals.
activities.what_worked: Penalty system elegantly handles the earnings risk — doesn't remove signals, just downgrades conviction. GOOGL went from potential 🔥 HOT to 57/100 correctly.
activities.improvements: Add post-earnings auto-reassessment — scanner should automatically re-run after earnings date passes

activities.title: Dashboard Text Parser Fix
activities.description: Stock scanner dashboard was showing empty patterns and bogus 'RS' cards. Fixed the text parsing logic in dashboard.py.
blockers: Complex regex parsing of scanner output
activities.what_worked: Traced the issue through the full parse pipeline
activities.what_didnt: First fix broke another card format
activities.improvements: Use structured JSON output from scanner instead of parsing text

activities.title: Sub-Agent Tool Building Sprint
activities.description: Spawned sub-agents to build: sector_rotation.py, earnings_calendar.py, dark_pool_tracker.py, signal_tracker.py. All completed and in testing.
activities.what_worked: Sub-agent spawning is incredibly efficient — 4 tools built in parallel in 30 min. Would have taken hours serially.
activities.what_didnt: Some sub-agents needed API data sources that may not be available
activities.improvements: Verify data sources for each tool before marking as production-ready

activities.title: Chart Intelligence Pipeline
activities.description: Built chart_screenshotter.py (TradingView screenshots), chart_vision.py (AI pattern grading), chart_intel.py (combined intel reports). Screenshots taken for GOOGL, AMD, NU.
activities.what_worked: AI vision correctly identified cup-with-handle, ascending base, VCP patterns. Grading system (A/B/C/F) adds value over math-only scanning.
activities.what_didnt: Browser automation flaky — sometimes pages don't load fully
activities.improvements: Add retry logic for screenshots. Consider headless mode for speed.

activities.title: CANSLIM Visual Guide v2 — Full Pattern Guide
activities.description: Created comprehensive visual guide covering all 7 CANSLIM patterns with real chart examples. Analyzed 7 charts (NVDA, NFLX, META, CELH, GOOGL, AMD, NU) with AI vision. Each pattern has definition, rules, real example, AI analysis, trade plan. Emailed to Rah with all chart images attached.
blockers: No Brave API key for web search
activities.what_worked: Using TradingView browser screenshots + AI vision analysis gave much better real-world examples than trying to find static images online. The vision model correctly identified patterns across multiple stocks.
activities.what_didnt: First version used 'column' field instead of 'status' in tasks JSON — had to debug
activities.improvements: Build a library of annotated chart examples over time. Each time scanner detects a pattern, save it as a teaching example.

activities.title: External Access Attempts (Cloudflare + Tailscale)
activities.description: Tried Cloudflare tunnels for external dashboard access — failed (tunnels kept dying). Tried Tailscale — failed (needs sudo password for pkg installer). Deprioritized in favor of local WiFi access.
activities.what_worked: Quick decision to fall back to local WiFi instead of fighting infrastructure issues
activities.what_didnt: Both Cloudflare and Tailscale approaches failed
activities.improvements: Try Tailscale again when admin password is available. Or use ngrok as alternative.

activities.title: Kanban Board Fix + Full Task Seeding
activities.description: Board was rendering empty — tasks.json used 'column' field but JS expected 'status'. Fixed field name. Then seeded with comprehensive 57-task list covering all work done tonight.
blockers: Field name mismatch between backend and frontend
activities.what_worked: Browser screenshot immediately revealed the empty board. API check confirmed data was there but field names mismatched.
activities.what_didnt: Initial seed only had 18 tasks — Rah wanted ALL tasks captured
activities.improvements: Auto-generate tasks from activity log. When logging an activity, optionally create/update a kanban task.

activities.title: Nightly Ops Engine — 4 Swimlane System
activities.description: Built nightly_ops.py with 4 swimlanes: Trading (full scanner pipeline), Contracts (deadline/follow-up tracking), Content (calendar/ideas), Automation (system health). Set up 11 PM EST cron job. Created contracts/pipeline.json and content/calendar.json frameworks.
activities.what_worked: Modular swimlane design — each lane is independent, can be developed incrementally. Cron job setup was straightforward.
activities.what_didnt: Full test run got killed during gateway restart
activities.improvements: Add more robust error handling per lane. One lane failing shouldn't kill the whole run.

activities.title: Brave Search API Configuration
activities.description: Configured Brave Search API key via gateway config.patch. Gateway restarted. Web search now functional.
blockers: First key provided was Anthropic key (wrong type)
Interactive configure wizard hard to automate
activities.what_worked: config.patch with tools.web.search.apiKey path worked after reading docs
activities.what_didnt: clawdbot configure --section web is interactive and hard to script
activities.improvements: Document the config.patch JSON path for future reference

activities.title: Gov Contracts Guide Research (Sub-Agent)
activities.description: Spawned sub-agent to research and write comprehensive government contracts guide: city (Hackensack), county (Bergen), state (NJ), federal. Covers certifications (SDVOSB, MBE, 8(a)), registrations (SAM.gov, NJSTART), strategy for 51/49 SDVOB partnership.
blockers: First attempt killed by gateway restart
activities.what_worked: Sub-agent approach — lets main session continue while research happens in background
activities.what_didnt: First spawn died during config restart. Had to respawn.
activities.improvements: Sub-agents should be resilient to gateway restarts

activities.title: BotExchange Telegram Group — Allowlist Config
activities.description: Added BotExchange group (-5208247029) to Telegram allowlist. First attempt used wrong ID format (-1005208247029 supergroup prefix) — group is a regular group, not supergroup. Fixed via Bot API getChat validation. Configured requireMention: true. Also turned off Group Privacy in BotFather so bot receives all messages.
activities.what_worked: Using Telegram Bot API getChat to validate the correct chat ID format
activities.what_didnt: Assumed -100 prefix for supergroups — regular groups use raw negative ID
activities.improvements: Always validate chat ID via Bot API before adding to config

activities.title: UiPath Autonomous Build Platform — TRD Review
activities.description: Reviewed Technical Requirements Document (TRD) v1.0 for Clawdbot-UiPath integration. Covers: cross-OS communication (macOS→Windows), UiPath execution agent, project constraints (Main.xaml, typed args, pinned packages), validation/execution loop, error handling, security isolation. Key constraint: must target UiPath Studio 2024.10.4 specifically for compatibility with Rah work environment.
activities.what_worked: PDF extraction with PyPDF2 — clean text output from the TRD
activities.what_didnt: pdftotext not installed, had to install PyPDF2
activities.improvements: Keep PyPDF2 installed for future PDF handling

activities.title: UTM + Windows 11 ARM VM Setup — In Progress
activities.description: Installing UTM (v4.7.5) via Homebrew for Windows 11 ARM VM on MacBook Air. Purpose: UiPath Studio 2024.10.4 execution environment. Stack: UTM + Windows 11 24H2 ARM + UiPath Community Edition. ISO being built via UUP dump (build 26100.7705). Dependencies installed: aria2, cabextract, wimlib, cdrtools. chntpw failed to build on Apple Silicon (known openssl@1.0 issue) — skipped, not critical for ISO build.
blockers: ISO download still in progress (~15 min remaining)
activities.what_worked: UUP dump macOS script approach — automated ISO build from Microsoft CDN
activities.what_didnt: chntpw brew formula broken on Apple Silicon (openssl@1.0 EC point validation errors)
activities.improvements: Consider pre-built VHDX images for faster setup in future
